arStrings.szText: "What are you doing here?"
Ah, it is good to see you again, fellow mage. I'm trying to purchase an elixir to protect me from dark magic, but this so-called alchemist says there are none to buy!
Ah, perhaps you can be of assistance. I'm trying to purchase an elixir to protect me from dark magic, but this so-called alchemist says there are none to buy!
Ah, perhaps you can be of assistance. I'm trying to purchase an elixir to protect me from dark magic, but this so-called alchemist says there are none to buy!
Ah, perhaps you can be of assistance. I'm trying to purchase an elixir to protect me from dark magic, but this so-called alchemist says there are none to buy!
Ah, perhaps you can be of assistance. I'm trying to purchase an elixir to protect me from dark magic, but this so-called alchemist says there are none to buy!
Ah, perhaps you can be of assistance. I'm trying to purchase an elixir to protect me from dark magic, but this so-called alchemist says there are none to buy!
I told you, you need to bring your own ingredients! I'm not running a charity.
Grumpy
My apologies. I am Mordarin, a sorcerer and scholar. Recently, I've been working to decipher some ancient mage clan scrolls.
My apologies. I am Mordarin, a sorcerer and scholar. Recently, I've been working to decipher some ancient mage clan scrolls.
My apologies. I am Mordarin, a sorcerer and scholar. Recently, I've been working to decipher some ancient mage clan scrolls.
My apologies. I am Mordarin, a sorcerer and scholar. Recently, I've been working to decipher some ancient mage clan scrolls.
After our...troubles...with the Forgotten Codex, I decided to return home to Kurast to re-read some of my old notes.
My apologies. I am Mordarin, a sorcerer and scholar. Recently, I've been working to decipher some ancient mage clan scrolls.
While doing so I found something strange...There is a connection between the mage clans and the armored snake creatures that infest the jungles east of here.
I intend to brave the ruins and see if I can't uncover more, but first I must protect myself from their particular type of shadow magic, which led me here to this...unhelpful merchant.
a pause before "unhelpful merchant" as you consider how useless they truly are.
(sighs)
exhausted, frustrated
Do you happen to have the ingredients for such an elixir?
probing. Said with a raised, hopeful eyebrow.
